name: Lob and Bob
description:
Lob and Bob is a platformer made for Trijam #128 with the theme "Throw it to me".

Make your way to the end of this platformer controlling the yellow character, Bob, who sometimes may have too much spring in his step.  Luckily, the red character Lob is there to help (or sometimes hinder), as he periodically throws a bouncy green ball which boosts Bob into the air when it makes contact with him.

Font Used: Karmatic Arcade (https://www.1001fonts.com/karmatic-arcade-font.html)

Jump Sound Effect: dklon (https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-jumping-sounds)

Bounce Sound Effect: jalastram (https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jump-1)
